sentences.en: " Ah'm talkin'' bout how it look ter folks, seein'Miss Pitty livin'' lone.
sentences.cn: " 我谈的是有些人采取的态度,眼见皮蒂小姐独个儿住在那里.

sentences.en: A lone cloud floated in the blue sky.
sentences.cn: 一缕孤云在蓝天中飘流.

sentences.en: A lone figure was standing at the bus stop.
sentences.cn: 公交车站上站着一个孤单的身影。

sentences.en: A lone gull flew across the sky.
sentences.cn: 一只孤单的海鸥飞过天空.

sentences.en: a lone sailor crossing the Atlantic
A lone sea gull flew across the sky.
sentences.cn: 一只孤独的海鸥在空中飞过.

sentences.en: Accustomed to flattering , flattery died upon his lips when he addressed Lone.
sentences.cn: 他是惯于阿谀奉承的, 可是一跟伊俄涅说话,却一句奉承的话都说不出来了.
好的领导者不是 “ 孤独的护林员 ”.

sentences.en: He was by no means a lone voice criticizing the government.
sentences.cn: 批评政府的绝不止他一个人。

sentences.en: I stood under the persimmon tree, looking at the lone little persimmon.
sentences.cn: 我仍旧站在那棵柿子树下, 望着树梢上那个孤零零的小火柿子.

sentences.en: I walked to the lone chair on stage and performed " Are You Lonesome Tonight? "
sentences.cn: 我走向台上孤零零的椅子,演奏了 《 今晚你可寂寞?

sentences.en: In that cloudy sky only one lone star could be seen.
sentences.cn: 在那多云的天上,只能看到孤零零的一颗星星.

sentences.en: Ninety per cent of lone parent families are headed by mothers.
Rosy evening clouds and lone ducks fly together.
The calm, lone scene reassured her.
sentences.cn: 恬静旷寂的夜景,叫她的心神安静起来.

sentences.en: The lone sentinel walked toward his post.
the lone survivor of a shipwreck
sentences.cn: 一次海难的唯一幸存者

sentences.en: With her sister she was much alone, a lone figure in a tossing, thoughtless sea.
sentences.cn: 和她姐姐在一起,她感到自己就像无情的汹涌大海里的一叶孤舟, 孤苦无依.

words.tran_cn: 孤独的人；不合群的动物

trans.tran_cn: 孤单的，孤独的，人迹稀少的，孤寂的
trans.tran_en: used to talk about the only person or thing in a place, or the only person or thing that does something
